column4: Is there anyone on who can help me with configuring a dual monitor setup?  I've got monitors working fairly well but there are some things that bug me that I'd like to fix.  Such as the fact that I can't drag windows from one monitor to the other and enabling xinerama seems to cause more problems than it solves.
Using an Nvidia card with the propriatary drivers.
Is that what you meant by adapter?  Otherwise I'm using basic Ubuntu, metacity gnome.
do you have compiz or desktop effects on?
turning off desktop effects doesn't change anything my cursor still stops as the edge of the first screen when I'm trying to move a window to the second
My main problem Is that I'd like to have a firefox window open on both displays and would like to be able to move a window from one display to the other.
Should I check in with you later or give you my email?
i'd post it into ubuntu forums. I'm doing research on both you and hipitihop's problem, its almost the same :P
Ok I'll stick around for a bit more
does the NCP detect your other monitor without any issues?
I'm not sure on your terminology.  I have both monitors working, I can move my mouse off one side and get to the other, so the computer has both monitors detected and displaying properly.
